p: Nassima and coworkers identified phenolic compounds in methanolic extracts and ethyl acetate fraction of Populus nigra L. buds (Ouzou, Algeria). Both extracts revealed a difference regarding the phenolic composition of the screened samples. Phytocompounds such as myrcitrin, luteolin7-O-glucoside, luteolin and apigenin were found only in ethyl acetate fraction in the amount of 13.42 mg/g of residue, 39.86 mg/g of residue, 10.81 mg/g of residue and respective 1.12 mg/g of residue. Both extracts contained ellagic acid, kaempferol and p-coumaric acid, although the highest concentration was observed for the ethyl acetate fraction. Rosmarinic acid and quercetin were only detected in the methanolic extracts of Populus nigra L. buds in the amount of 14.46 mg/g of residue and respective 2.07 mg/g of residue [ 24].
